summary: This document contains financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank as of June 30, 2017. It includes details about account balances, transactions, and asset allocations, highlighting significant cash disbursements and income generated from investments.

events.title: Account Summary
events.description: Summary of Jeffrey Epstein's financial activities and account status at Deutsche Bank as of June 30, 2017.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance as of June 30, 2017, which was approximately $78,627.12.
Significant cash disbursements totaling $373,870.68 were made from Epstein's account during June 2017.
The account is managed by Stewart Oldfield and has a custody officer named Arthur Tendler.
The document includes various financial metrics such as market value, income, and realized/unrealized gains/losses.
There are multiple references to transactions involving foreign currency and cash management activities.
